row.process:
:SET &counter# = 0 :SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_LDAP.PRV.VARA.TEMP.PP_SEARCH_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :SET &variableLine# = "" :SET &key# = "" :SET &startRecording# = "0" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE
:IF &ret# <> 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = &ret# :ELSE : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"LDAP-Search-Result: ") : SET &posCount# = STR_FIND(&line#,"LDAP-Search-Result-Count: ") : IF &posCount# > 0 : SET &posCount# = &posCount# + 26 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&posCount#) : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_LDAP_RESULT_COUNT# = &line# : ENDIF : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 20 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &key# = &line#; : SET &startRecording# = "1" : ELSE : IF &startRecording# = "1" : IF &line# = "" : IF &variableLine# = "" : SET &variableLine# = "none" : ENDIF : SET &length# = STR_LENGTH(&variableLine#) : SET &length# = SUB(&length#, 1) : IF &length# > 1 : SET &variableLine# = STR_CUT(&variableLine#, 1, &length#) : IF &key# <> "" : IF &variableLine# <> "" : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&key#", "&variableLine#" : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &counter# = ADD(&counter#,1) : SET &key# = "" : SET &variableLine# = "" : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &lengthLine# = STR_LENGTH(&line#) : SET &lengthResult# = STR_LENGTH(&variableLine#) : SET &currentlength# = &lengthLine# + &lengthResult# : IF &currentlength# < 1023 : SET &variableLine# = STR_CAT(&variableLine#, &line#) : SET &variableLine# = STR_CAT(&variableLine#, ",") : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS :ENDIF :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_LDAP_SEARCH# = "&variableName#"
